com.fluidops.iwb.api.solution
Class GroovyHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.util.scripting.GroovyHelper
      com.fluidops.util.scripting.GroovyScriptHelper
          com.fluidops.iwb.api.solution.GroovyHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
SolutionHandler<InstallationResult>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GroovyConfigHandler
public class GroovyHandler
extends com.fluidops.util.scripting.GroovyScriptHelper
implements SolutionHandler<InstallationResult>

Solution handler for custom installation behaviour executed by groovy scripts. This handler will execute all groovy scripts inside the specified directory. The scripts need to have the following method:
go(SolutionInfo, solutionDir, applicationDir)

The solutionDir represents the directory with the data of the solution as File.
The applicationDir represents the directory of the target installation as File.
An example usage is to use those two paths to manually copy files of the solution into the application.

install

public InstallationResult install(SolutionInfo solutionInfo,
                                  java.io.File solutionDir)
Description copied from interface: SolutionHandler
Install one aspect of the solution found in the directory solutionDir into the application The content of solutionDir is typically created by unzipping a solution-artifact into it.

Specified by:
install in interface SolutionHandler<InstallationResult>
Parameters:
solutionInfo - metadata on the whole solution to be installed
solutionDir - the directory of the "unzipped" solution.
Returns:
Information about the installation.
